translations.chinese: 十年冬十月，淮南王、燕王、荊王、梁王、楚王、齊王、長沙王來朝。
translations.english: In the tenth month of winter in the tenth year, the King of Huainan, King of Yan, King of Jing, King of Liang, King of Chu, King of Qi, King of Changsha all came to court.
In the fifth month of summer, the Taishang Empress passed away.

translations.chinese: 秋七月癸卯，太上皇崩，葬萬年。
translations.english: In the seventh month of autumn on the day guimao, the Taishang Huang passed away and was buried at Wannian.
He pardoned death sentences and below for prisoners in Queyang.

translations.chinese: 八月，令諸侯王皆立太上皇廟于國都。
translations.english: In the eighth month, he commanded all feudal lords to establish Taishang Huang temples in their capitals.
